verses.name: Daniel 2:7
verses.text: They answered again and said, Let the king tell his servants the dream, and we will shew the interpretation of it.

verses.name: Daniel 2:8
verses.text: The king answered and said, I know of certainty that ye would gain the time, because ye see the thing is gone from me.

verses.name: Daniel 2:9
verses.text: But if ye will not make known unto me the dream, there is but one decree for you: for ye have prepared lying and corrupt words to speak before me, till the time be changed: therefore tell me the dream, and I shall know that ye can shew me the interpretation thereof.
